config.text: ﻿﻿Tutorial
All of the LRS tools are in this toolbar.﻿
﻿﻿Click on an icon to pop-out the tool. The tool panels can be moved to anywhere on your screen.﻿
LRS Identify

﻿﻿Tutorial
﻿ A table is anchored to the bottom of your screen. You can see the results from other tools in this table and edit data in the table.
﻿﻿Tutorial
﻿Use the Route Search tool to find a specific LRS route.
Search with routeid, routename or an array of criteria to find routes. You can also use measures to find parts of a route.
﻿﻿Tutorial
﻿ Use LRS Identify to see route information.
Use the LRS Identify tool and click on a route to see additional information about a route and relevant events.
